metadata.description: Custom dictionary for consistent translation of proper nouns and domain-specific terms

proper_nouns._comment: Names of people, places, organizations, brands that need consistent translation. Do NOT add common words.

domain_terms._comment: Document-specific terms requiring consistent translation. Do NOT add common words - let the translator handle them naturally based on context.

preserve_original._comment: Terms to keep in original form without translation

style_notes._comment: Optional notes about translation style, formality level, etc.
